articles.description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary as Liverpool take on Chelsea in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Women's Super League LIVE: Liverpool vs Chelsea - score, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: It is 30 years since the death of Ayrton Senna. Sid Watkins, the man who tried to save him, was a close friend who led two safety revolutions within Formula 1.
articles.title: Sid Watkins, Ayrton Senna and Formula 1's safety revolution

articles.description: Jadon Sancho could return to Manchester United this summer as a Champions League winner, but his future at the club remains uncertain.
articles.title: Borussia Dortmund v PSG: Jadon Sancho's future analysed

articles.description: Russian seventh seed Andrey Rublev ends Carlos Alcaraz's dominance at the Madrid Open with a 4-6 6-3 6-2 win.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Carlos Alcaraz title defence ended by Andrey Rublev

articles.description: Judd Trump suffers a shock 13-9 loss to Jak Jones in the quarter-finals of the World Championship at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.
articles.title: Judd Trump suffers shock quarter-final loss to Jak Jones

articles.description: Red Bull confirm their design chief Adrian Newey will leave the team in 2025.
articles.title: Red Bull confirm designer Adrian Newey exit

articles.description: Paris St-Germain are "built to win the Champions League", according to Dortmund boss Edin Terzic.
articles.title: PSG 'built to win Champions League' - Dortmund boss

articles.description: Former Bolton Wanderers footballer Fabrice Muamba, Luton Town's Tom Lockyer and Wigan Athletic's Charlie Wyke share how CPR saved their lives following on-pitch cardiac arrests.
articles.title: Cardiac arrests: Fabrice Muamba, Tom Lockyer and Charlie Wyke call for more CPR training

articles.description: Kristen Faulkner wins stage four of Vuelta Femenina in Zaragoza as Marianne Vos takes the red jersey from Kata Blanka Vas.
articles.title: Vuelta Femenina: Kristen Faulkner wins stage four as Marianne Vos takes red jersey

articles.description: Former captain Steve Smith is left out of Australia's squad for June's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Australia omit Steve Smith as Mitchell Marsh named captain
